name: Beware redline
description:
Demo 1.01 I want to make a drag&dodge game. So,I make it with minimal style.

I made this game since 2018 but I decide to release this demo because I have a

burnout problem. Beside Cave of Avaritia, I can't make new game project.

If you like this game please comment.

Update for Demo 1.01

-10 stage

-auto save
